title: Construction cost per kilometer of high-speed line in France 2014
yAxis: Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing High-speed Line, and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in each High-speed Line on the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
The difference of Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros between the highest and lowest High-speed Line is 14.2.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing High-speed Line, and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in each High-speed Line on the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
The difference of Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros between the highest and lowest High-speed Line is 14.2.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has the highest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros and LGV Paris-Lyon has the lowest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros.
High-speed Line LGV Rhine-Rhone has the second highest value for Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros.
The maximum High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has got 3.58 times higher Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the minimum High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean is 19.7 , second place is LGV Rhine-Rhone at 17.5, and thirdly is LGV East at 15.7.
The High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean tends to be 1.45 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all High-speed Lines, we get total 108.5.
